name: Space Junk (itch) (kldenmark3)
description:
Controls:

WASD - steer ship

Mouse - control camera

Ctrl - attract other parts closer to your ship

Run into floating ship parts to add them to your ship!  Once you have collected:

Booster (pyramid shape) - Shift to activate

Guns - Spacebar to shoot

Navigate the asteroid field and get to the space station before you run out of oxygen!
